question: Union Minister for Urban development and housing M. Venkaiah Naidu launched which of the following app with MSEFC portal?
explanation: Union Minister for Urban development and housing M. Venkaiah Naidu launched Micro and small Enterprises Facilitation Council(MSEFC) Portal and My MSME app. It was launched as a part of digital India initiative from the perspective of the MSME sector in the country. The grievances field will be communicated through the email and sms instantly.
